interpParagraph.label: 1026-32-a-1-ii-Interp-1-iv
interpParagraph.content: For 2018, $1,052, reflecting a 2.2 percent increase in the CPI-U from June 2016 to June 2017, rounded to the nearest whole dollar.

interpParagraph.label: 1026-32-a-1-ii-Interp-3-iv
interpParagraph.content: For 2018, $21,032, reflecting a 2.2 percent increase in the CPI-U from June 2016 to June 2017, rounded to the nearest whole dollar.

interpParagraph.label: 1026-43-e-3-ii-Interp-1-iv
interpParagraph.content: For 2018, reflecting a 2.2 percent increase in the CPI-U that was reported on the preceding June 1, a covered transaction is not a qualified mortgage unless the transaction's total points and fees do not exceed:

interpParagraph.label: 1026-43-e-3-ii-Interp-1-iv-A
interpParagraph.content: For a loan amount greater than or equal to $105,158: 3 percent of the total loan amount;

interpParagraph.label: 1026-43-e-3-ii-Interp-1-iv-B
interpParagraph.content: For a loan amount greater than or equal to $63,095 but less than $105,158: $3,155;

interpParagraph.label: 1026-43-e-3-ii-Interp-1-iv-C
interpParagraph.content: For a loan amount greater than or equal to $21,032 but less than $63,095: 5 percent of the total loan amount;

interpParagraph.label: 1026-43-e-3-ii-Interp-1-iv-D
interpParagraph.content: For a loan amount greater than or equal to $13,145 but less than $21,032: $1,052;

interpParagraph.label: 1026-43-e-3-ii-Interp-1-iv-E
interpParagraph.content: For a loan amount less than $13,145: 8 percent of the total loan amount.

interpParagraph.label: 1026-52-b-1-ii-Interp-2-i-E
interpParagraph.content: Card issuers were permitted to impose a fee for violating the terms of an agreement if the fee did not exceed $27 under § 1026.52(b)(1)(ii)(A) and $38 under § 1026.52(b)(1)(ii)(B), through December 31, 2017.
